note: This data is expressed in [international-$](#dod:int_dollar_abbreviation) at 2021 prices. Income has been [equivalized](#dod:equivalization).
title: Threshold income per month marking the 8th decile (after tax)
subtitle: The level of income per month below which 80% of the population falls. This data is adjusted for inflation and differences in living costs between countries. Income here is measured after taxes and benefits.
